title: LEED Silver Certification, Community Room/Patio, Controlled Entry
posting_body: ['1736 Boulder Street managed by Cornerstone Apartments', 'Bedrooms:', '1', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Ft.:', '585', 'Price:', '$1885/mo.', "B Street LoHi opened its doors at 1736 Boulder Street for the first time in the Fall of 2013, and with its thoughtful and energy-efficient design, it's no surprise the building won The University of Denver's Project of the Year award.", 'The 73-unit building contains a mix of studios, one, and two-bedroom apartments, each with its own balcony, in-unit washer and dryer, barn door closets, granite countertops, and 9-foot ceilings.', 'The design carries a contemporary yet timeless feel while also honing in on the features Denver residents value: rustic, wilderness vibes blended with urban, city living.', 'Beetle kill wood, sound blocking steel frame, neutral finishes, and of course, rooftop views of both the city and the mountains accentuate the design.', 'The building welcomes and encourages dogs and cats in this pet-friendly community.', 'Residents at B Street LoHi can enjoy on-site parking, a fitness room, a rooftop patio with a fire pit, a club room featuring a pool table and a kegerator, a bike repair station, and a business center.', 'The LEED Silver certified five-story building was designed with the environment in mind, including features to reduce electricity costs and water consumption, as well as becoming the first building in the nation to be framed with 95% recycled steel.', 'B Street LoHi is an Urban Infill Development in the heart of the popular LoHi neighborhood with easy access to downtown via the pedestrian bridge over I-25 and the South Platte River.', 'The culturally vibrant locale is nestled in the northwest corner of Denver and features trendy boutiques, art galleries, diverse cuisines, and nightlife galore.', 'Imagine yourself living here just a short walk to Confluence Park, Avanti Food & Beverage Hall, Little Person Ice Cream, and much more!', 'Features:', 'Rooftop Deck/Patio', 'Granite Countertops', 'Walk-in Closets', 'A/C', 'Smoke-Free Building', 'Microwave', 'Wood Style Flooring', 'Dishwasher', 'Reserved Parking', 'In-Unit Laundry', 'Fitness Room', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Contact us:', 'To schedule a showing please contact our leasing team at', 'To apply NOW please visit <URL>', 'Nearby Neighborhoods:', "Uptown, West Wash Park, RiNo, Five Points, Platt Park, LoHi, Sloan's Lake, Cheesman Park, City Park, Highlands, University of Denver, Baker, Congress Park, Jefferson Park, Capitol Hill, Hale, Downtown", 'Availability and pricing are subject to change.']
